topics.title: Overview
topics.content:
## Bug Report

File bug reports and feature requests directly to the Clubhouse project on GitHub. Reports are created as GitHub issues with severity labels and type classification.

Requires the **`gh` CLI** installed and authenticated (`gh auth login`).

topics.title: Key Features
topics.content:
## Key Features

**File Reports** — Click **+ New Report** and fill in type (Bug/Enhancement), severity (Low/Medium/High/Critical), title, and description. The severity is prefixed to the title automatically (e.g. `[HIGH] Login fails on startup`).

**Browse Reports** — Switch between **My Reports** (your filed issues) and **All Recent** (issues across all reporters). Click any report to view full details.

**Detail View** — See the full report body, comments, metadata, and labels. Open the report on GitHub for additional actions.

topics.title: Commands
topics.content:
## Commands

Available from the command palette:

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| **Refresh Reports** | Reloads the report list from GitHub |
| **File New Report** | Opens the report creation form |
| **View Report in Browser** | Opens the selected report on GitHub |

topics.title: Permissions
topics.content:
## Permissions

| Permission | Why it's needed |
|------------|----------------|
| **logging** | Log diagnostic information for troubleshooting |
| **storage** | Cache report data locally |
| **notifications** | Show success/error notifications after filing |
| **commands** | Register command palette entries |
| **process** | Execute the `gh` CLI to create and query issues |
| **theme** | Adapt colors and styles to the current theme |
